main: ^You pass a roadside sushi stand and someone suggests stopping for a quick bite.
^Make a joke about gas station sushi
FirstChoice: ^You stop and buy some sushi. It's surprisingly good, and everyone enjoys the treat. (PARTY happiness +1, food +2)
SecondChoice: ^You decide to keep driving, but everyone grumbles about missing out on the sushi. (PARTY happiness -0.5)
ThirdChoice: ^You make a joke about gas station sushi being a health hazard. Everyone laughs, though they're still a bit hungry. (PARTY happiness +0.5)
